sessionStart.command: echo 'Welcome! Here is your programming joke of the day:' && curl -s https://v2.jokeapi.dev/joke/Programming?type=single --max-time 3 | node -e "process.stdin.on('data',d=>{try{console.log(JSON.parse(d).joke||'Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!')}catch{console.log('Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!')}})"
